sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' import { VIDEO_DATA} from "../../Utils/APIEndpoints"; class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id: 1, data: '' } componentDidMount() { axios.get(VIDEO_DATA + this.state.id) .then((response) => { this.setState({data: response.data}) }) } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { if(this.state.id != this.props.match.params.vid) { axios.get(VIDEO_DATA + this.props.currentId) .then((response) => { this.setState({id: this.props.currentId, data: response.data}) }) } } render() { return (
